result.title: Second session of international/regional one day technical seminars
result.description: This deliverable is connected with Task 8.1 (Dissemination of project results).Second session of international/regional one-day technical seminars will be executed around 42 month in Spain, Italy, Slovenia/Croatia and Netherlands in order to discuss with actors along the value chain and potential users systemic (CinderOSS digital business ecosystem), technical, legislative and economic outputs of the project so-far. The main objective of this second session of regional / international technical workshops is to get fit-backs from different actors along the value chain about the demonstrations and its optimization from users of service. By organizing simultaneous technical workshop in different environments and different level of innovation project will gain valuable information about increase customer readiness level, as well will create valuable network for exploitation and dissemination including marketing of new service and technologies.
